Sentencas: Samaria-doped ceria (Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9, SDC) is a promising candidate material for electrolyte of inter-mediate temperature (600-800 degrees C) solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: SDC powders were synthesized by a combustion method with urea as a fuel.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: The phase purity and morphology of the resulting powders were characterized by XRD, TG-DSC, FESEM and BET specific surface area measurement.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: Moreover, the sinterability and electrical conductivity of the SDC were examined.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the urea-combustion process Is a simple and efficient route to produce high reactive SDC powder.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: It was found that the SDC powder with a pure cubic fluorite phase could be produced via a short-time combustion process.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: The SDC powder is composed of uniform and dispersed sphere-like particles in the range of 50-150 nm.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: This desired morphology effectively enhanced the sinterability of the powder.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: A gas-tight relative density of 95.1% was obtained in the SDC ceramic sintered at a relative low temperature of 1250 degrees
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9

Sentencas: C. Furthermore, the ceramic sintered at the temperature presented superior electrical conductivity, reaching 5.4 x 10(-2) and 1.0 x 10(-1) Omega(-1).cm(-1) at the measuring temperatures of 600 and 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Urea-combustion Synthesis and Properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9
